name: Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design
description: The Handcrafted Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design by Heritage Ceramics is a beautiful and functional addition to your tea time ritual. This tea set features a classic floral design with intricate hand-painted details on durable earthenware. Each piece is crafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques, resulting in a unique and high-quality tea set that brings elegance to any table setting. Perfect for afternoon tea or special occasions, this set includes a teapot, cups, saucers, and a sugar bowl.

name: Rustic Earthenware Flower Pot - Mediterranean Style
description: The Rustic Handcrafted Earthenware Flower Pot - Mediterranean Style by Mediterranean Arts is a charming addition to your garden or home. This flower pot features a classic Mediterranean design with a rustic finish that adds character and elegance to any space. Handcrafted from high-quality earthenware, it is perfect for growing your favorite plants or as a decorative element for your home. Each pot is made by experienced artisans, ensuring durability and a unique, timeless appeal.
